verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: At the close of their historic summit] , [ARG0: the two leaders] [V: signed] [ARG1: what Trump called a " comprehensive " agreement to commit to denuclearization]

At the close of their historic summit , the two leaders signed what Trump called a " comprehensive " agreement to [V: commit] [ARG2: to denuclearization]
